=== About Me ===
Not much to tell. I got my start in pc's in 1996. I used windows until May '09. I got hooked by Kubuntu 8.04. I soon learned about Ubuntu(with gnome), switched, and have been stuck and happy ever since.
==== Ubuntu Hour ====

Working with the NC team we've started an Ubuntu <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Hour | Hour]]</nowiki> in <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/NorthCarolinaTeam/Events/WinstonHour | Winston-Salem]]</nowiki>, NC.
